text: Marvel Rivals is a free-to-play hero shooter by NetEase Games and Marvel Games, released on December 6, 2024, for PS5, Xbox Series X/S, and Windows. It features 35 Marvel Comics characters and supports cross-play. == Playable characters == Vanguards * Bruce Banner / Hulk * Captain America * Doctor Strange * Groot * Magneto * Peni Parker * Thing * Thor * Venom Duelists * Black Panther * Black Widow * Hawkeye * Hela * Human Torch * Iron Fist * Iron Man * Magik * Mister Fantastic * Moon Knight * Namor * Psylocke * Punisher * Scarlet Witch * Spider-Man * Squirrel Girl * Star-Lord * Storm * Winter Soldier * Wolverine Strategists * Adam Warlock * Cloak & Dagger * Invisible Woman * Jeff the Land Shark * Loki * Luna Snow * Mantis * Rocket Raccoon ==Notes== == References == == Other websites == * Category:2024 video games Category:Free-to-play video games Category:Hero shooters Category:Multiplayer video games Category:PlayStation 5 games Category:Third-person shooters Category:Video games based on Marvel Comics Category:Video games developed in China Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Windows games Category:Xbox Series X and Series S games
title: Marvel Rivals
